items.title: No, of Course You Can't Actually Play the New Lego Game Boy
items.description: A promo video of the new brick-built Nintendo collaboration has some people confused as to what your $60 will buy you.

items.title: Zenbivy Light Bed Review: Still the Best Backcountry Sleep System
items.description: The revamped Zenbivy Light Bed still uses the company’s clever quilt-and-sheet sleeping system, but sheds some ounces for ultralight backpackers.

items.title: The Kindle Colorsoft Just Got Two More Models
items.description: There's now a Kindle Colorsoft Kids, plus a cheaper, 16GB version of the main Colorsoft.

items.title: SteelSeries Rival 3 Gen 2 Review: Good Budget Gaming Mice
items.description: SteelSeries’ latest wireless and wired Rival 3 Gen 3 are the budget gaming mice to beat.

items.title: Dynabook Portégé Z40L-N Review: Replaceable Batteries, High Price
items.description: This corporate laptop brings back the replaceable battery.
